Nam sollicitudin est sed dui interdum rhoncus. International Exchange (MBA/MSc) NUCB Business School JapanInternational Exchange Program at NUCB, Japan, as part of my Software Engineering Degree. I was able to complete this program with the help of the JASSO scholarship awarded by the Japanese government to exchange students with outstanding grades. Courses in NUCB included subjects from both MSc and MBA programs such as Design Thinking, Strategic Thinking, Digital Marketing, Service Design, etc. Skills #Honors and Awards #Languages #
